episodes.title: RICO Revealed: The Truth Behind LTD's Racketeering Practices
episodes.description:
In this episode, we do a deep dive into LTD’s illegal racketeering operations. We give listeners an informed decision about the dangers of being involved with LTD's illegal Racketeering system. It is explained why high level Amway Pins apart of LTD purposefully decide not to disclose the LTD Compensation with both prospects and downline. In addition, it is proven why every member of LTD has the legal right to be disclosed the LTD Tools compensation plan. Along with that, we discuss LTD's biggest fears, and the motive behind LTD's deceptive tactics to defraud the public. 


Sources:

RICO Charge - https://www.patitucelaw.com/blog/2024/april/understanding-rico-charges-and-defenses-in-feder/#:~:text=What%20Is%20RICO?,and%20activities%20of%20the%20enterprise.

episodes.title: Deception of Network Marketing: The Real Story
episodes.description: In this episode, we expose how numerous people all over the U.S. are being lured to joining Amway through being disclosed a "FALSE" Amway Compensation Plan. All over the U.S. prospects and Amway Distributers are not being the shown the true Amway Compensation Plan. Instead, individuals are being disclosed a "FAKE" Amway Compensation Plan involving false income claims. Because of this people are enticed and induced into believing in a lifestyle and income potential that is not true. We uncover these deliberate lies made by Amway Distributers by revealing the "TRUE" Compensation Plan and earning potential from Amway. In addition, Amway high level pins are exposed by being caught in the act of violating several laws. Sources: Amway U.S Income Disclosures Dating From to 2010 - https://www.sequenceinc.com/fraudfiles/2012/12/amway-earnings-disclosure-statements/ Amway Prospecting Guidelines - https://www.amway.com/media-location/AmwayProspectOpportunityMessagingGuide_USEN Recordings of Rich Devos & Amway High Level Pins Talking About The Legalities of The Tools System - https://www.amway.com/media-location/AmwayProspectOpportunityMessagingGuide_USEN Amway U.S Income Disclosures of 2023 - https://www.amway.com/en_US/income-disclosure FTC Act - https://www.ftc.gov/business-guidance/resources/business-guidance-concerning-multi-level-marketing#:~:text=MLMs%20can%20be%20held%20liable,for%20use%20in%20their%20marketing. False Claims Act - https://bergermontague.com/false-and-misleading-statements-by-omission-actionable-under-false-claims-act/ RICO Charge - https://www.patitucelaw.com/blog/2024/april/understanding-rico-charges-and-defenses-in-feder/#:~:text=What%20Is%20RICO?,and%20activities%20of%20the%20enterprise. Hugh Zhang Interview - (Emerald From The BWW Tools System): https://youtu.be/x9mWaGRkcGs?si=wfLWOVYFrdoZaNM_ Michelle Garabito Interview - (Ruby From The BWW Tools System): https://youtu.be/x9mWaGRkcGs?si=wfLWOVYFrdoZaNM_ https://youtu.be/x9mWaGRkcGs?si=wfLWOVYFrdoZaNM_ Anna Garritano - (Former Q12 Platinum From The LTD Tools System): https://youtu.be/x9mWaGRkcGs?si=wfLWOVYFrdoZaNM_ https://youtu.be/x9mWaGRkcGs?si=wfLWOVYFrdoZaNM_ Robert Michael - (Former Amway IBO Personally Sponsored by Larry Winters Son Named Steven Winters): https://youtu.be/x9mWaGRkcGs?si=wfLWOVYFrdoZaNM_ LTD Login & Registration Page - https://www.ltdteam.com/Authentication/LogOn?ReturnUrl=%2F My Website: www.unplugltdtools.com My Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/unplug.podcast?igsh=MXAxeWozcWJsamtsaA== Wanna Reach Out to Me? tomwesten1@gmail.com

episodes.title: The Dismantle of MLMs - (URGENT message & Announcement to The Anti-MLM Community)
episodes.description:
This is an URGENT message to the ENTIRE Anti MLM community, as well as any individual that is against MLMs. There is a law firm that works with other large law firms and does class action lawsuits on the behalf of IBOs/distributers. Lawyers for this firm are investigating ALL MLMs. They would like to connect with any individual that was in an MLM or know anyone that has been in an MLM. They would also like to speak to individuals currently in an MLM. The reason being is because they need all the information they can gather towards taking legal action against ALL MLMs. On an additional note, people can also join a class action-(outside of my class action law suit) against the MLM they were specifically apart of. Lastly, they would like to investigate individuals who have sold Amway products to US Government Agencies. The information of the lawyer is below 👇. Please send the message as well the lawyer's contact info everywhere; especially the Anti-MLM community. 

Email of Lawyer: Greg@usclassactions.com 

Phone Number of Lawyer: (469)-454-8272 

My Website: www.unplugltdtools.com

episodes.title: Unmasking The Grifts: The Truth Behind Online Entrepreneurs
episodes.description: In this episode, we expose the deliberate lies and deceptions made by online entrepreneur gurus. Unfortunately, the financial education industry has a lot of people selling training and courses over areas they have no experience in. Each and every single one of these training programs guarantee wealth and financial independence; if genuine effort is applied. However, these "so called" gurus have no credibility or tangible success in the areas they claim to have. In this episode, we warn listeners on how to tell a real credible entrepreneur from a fake entrepreneur guru. Also, we uncover how fake Entrepreneur gurus flaunt their FAKE lifestyles and manipulate people into purchasing their financial educational programs. Lastly, we expose the lie of Amway "High Level" Pins being a sacred pillar for financial sucess. Sources: Dan Lok High Ticket Sales Scam - https://youtu.be/QzzDz2Bl4ko?si=R1wSfaHaNEPaUEtF Robert Kiyosaki Rich Dad Poor Dad Scam - https://open.spotify.com/episode/1sqPsRzo804XLboxT2uwmL?si=G3LnoUUtSNSC-JP3YjP7jg https://www.lazymanandmoney.com/robert-kiyosaki-and-multi-level-marketing-exposed/ Evidence of Robert Kiyosaki Being an Amway IBO - https://youtu.be/ZmAtl2JL1iY?si=4rATcNfmq5vFE2lO https://youtu.be/MS77kTUWuCo?si=yNQNfK-awJ06oT4u Grant Cardone Scam - https://youtu.be/M7SrO-D2TwQ?si=vI261-p9NK50-s-w https://youtu.be/Qaiuvr56c8M?si=GUCCzsFU-khZw8lY Andrew Tate Scam - https://youtu.be/x2HulKg66xA?si=ZdNEJOXV_JJHpCWn Tai Lopez Scam - https://youtu.be/BBCJttQS3V0?si=uC_FdlrXwPmPxd9O Hugh Zhang - (Former Emerald) from the BWW Tools System - https://youtu.be/x9mWaGRkcGs?si=wfLWOVYFrdoZaNM_ NBC Dateline Exposing the Tools System - https://youtu.be/Fi9RtJEHGSc?si=TmR5duuFbpUkZ5Bu Robert Fitzpatrick Interviewed by Coffeezilla - https://youtu.be/X-p0G4FEMMg?si=6ihLoBPYzzCpXVhy My Website - www.unplugltdtools.com Wanna Reach Out to Me? tomwesten1@gmail.com Instagram - https://www.instagram.com/unplug.podcast?igsh=MXAxeWozcWJsamtsaA==

episodes.title: Project 1 & Project 2
episodes.description: In this episode, we unveil the realities of accomplishing Project 1 and Project 2. Project 1 is proclaimed to be a project of reaching the Amway Platinum level in 1 to 2 years generating $50K to $75K annually. Project 2 is proclaimed to be a project of reaching the Amway Ruby level in 2 to 3 years generating $80K to $120K annually. We expose the truth of how feasible these project really are. In addition, we reveal the hypocrisies of the Amway Platinums in LTD & the lack of credibility they REALLY have. Sources: Merchants of Deception by Eric Scheibeler - (Former Emerald) https://www.transgallaxys.com/~emerald/DOWNLOADBOOK.html Sean Munger -(Historian) Information https://youtu.be/P9nA3pqSaf8?si=EnjofUuZt-LSxofL Michelle Garabito - (Ruby from BWW System) & Hugh Zhang - (Emerald from BWW System) information https://youtu.be/x9mWaGRkcGs?si=wfLWOVYFrdoZaNM_ Jeff Probandt - ( Emerald from The Dexter Yager Group) Information https://www.jehovahs-witness.com/topic/32839/jeff-probandt-ray-franz-amway https://www.jehovahs-witness.com/topic/32920/jeff-probandt-ray-franz-amway-pt-ii Ruth Carter - (former Amway IBO & Assistant/Employee for a Diamond) Information https://www.amazon.com/Amway-Motivational-Organizations-Behind-Mirrors/dp/0967107024 Jud Ayers - (Platinum from LTD) www.WeWillStand.info William Lutz - (Doublespeak) https://youtu.be/Fub8PsNxBqI?si=QTNTw9CpcDQ6Hc_z My website - www.unplugltdtools.com Wanna reach out to me? tomwesten1@gmail.com #FakeDiamondSchwers #DeceptiveTradePractice #JoeMarkiewiczIsAnEmerald #LTD9kStrong! #Daniel&ThaoGoebelAreScamArtists

episodes.description: In this episode, I change my stance with LTD by making a legal declaration of War. Not only do I dive deep into the details of the lawsuit, I clarify why every Amway IBO that has ever been apart of LTD should feel mad and deceived about the LTD "so called" tool system. LTD is a deceptive trade practice that has been operating illegally for years. The LTD "so called" tool system will be held accountable for all the illegal actions they have been getting away with for years.
